mapper.select:
select r.*, cnt.count as count from(select info_id as infoid, name, cpu_socket as socket, cpu_manufacture as manufacture, cpu_core as core, cpu_thread as thread, baseclock, boosterclock, L3cache as cache, tdp from CPU_INFO where name like concat('%',#{q},'%') and useFlag ='Y'
and info_id in(1,2)
and info_id in(${infoid})
and cpu_id =#{cpu_id}
order by id asc limit 9 offset ${p})r ,(select count(id) as count from CPU_INFO where useFlag= 'Y'
and info_id in(1,2)
and info_id in(${infoid})
and cpu_id =#{cpu_id}
and name like concat('%',#{q},'%'))cnt
